description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A game designed for your young child's entertainment. Minimum button control use allows your child to have fun and may also improve their hand/eye coordination at the same time. Four different games to choose from.
